attributes.action: Declare colonization of any country illegal, just like slavery is made illegal and a taboo.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Slavery was as wrong as Colonization.  However, the colonization is still viewed as "not bad".

It seems as the country becomes stronger and stronger, it is becoming fashionable to colonize/conquer a weaker country either in the name of “democracy” or “civilization”.

"Sun Never sets on the British Empire" becoming a goal of some stronger countries, except they would like to replace British by their country's name.

Is communist colonization of Tibet any worse or different than the colonization by Europeans?  They all want to be like "Churchill"!  Fight in the name of "Freedom", while subjugating millions to harsh treatments and forcibly ruling them.

We should make "colonization" a taboo and illegal, just like the slavery.
